data.question: What is the main goal of propyne/propylene separation?
data.answer: To produce polymer-grade C3H6 and recover high-purity C3H4.

data.question: What is the name of the ultrastable MOF reported for C3H4/C3H6 separation?
What is the C3H4 storage capacity of ZNU-2 at 1.0 bar and 298 K?
How does the pore size and functionality of ZNU-2 contribute to its gas separation performance?
data.answer: The precisely controlled pore size, shape, and functionality of ZNU-2 contribute to its benchmark C3H4 storage and high C3H4/C3H6 separation potential.

data.question: Is ZNU-2 stable under humid conditions?
What is the IAST selectivity range for C3H4/C3H6 separation using ZNU-2?
What is the adsorption heat (Qst) for C3H4 in ZNU-2?
Does ZNU-2 exhibit higher C3H4 storage capacity at low pressure compared to other anion pillared MOFs?
What structural feature of ZNU-2 aids in its high C3H4/C3H6 separation performance?
data.answer: The symmetrical spatial distribution of six TiF6 2- pillars on the icosahedral pore surface provides distinct binding sites for C3H4 adsorption.

data.question: Can ZNU-2 produce polymer-grade C3H6 from a 1/99 C3H4/C3H6 mixture?
What is the productivity of polymer-grade C3H6 from a 10/90 C3H4/C3H6 mixture using ZNU-2?
How does ZNU-2 compare to Cu-BTC in terms of C3H4 capacity at 10 kPa?
data.answer: ZNU-2 has a higher C3H4 capacity at 10 kPa compared to Cu-BTC.

data.question: Is the adsorption rate of C3H4 in ZNU-2 faster than that of C3H6?
What is the role of the contracted necks in ZNU-2's structure?
data.answer: The contracted necks provide different diffusion kinetics for molecules with different shapes and diameters, aiding in gas separation.

data.question: Does ZNU-2 maintain its separation performance after 10 cycles?
What is the global production capacity of propylene as of 2020?
What is the BET surface area of ZNU-2?
Can ZNU-2 recover high-purity C3H4 from a 50/50 C3H4/C3H6 mixture?
What is the significance of the cooperative host–guest and guest–guest interactions in ZNU-2?
data.answer: These interactions boost C3H4 accommodation in the cages, contributing to ZNU-2's high C3H4 storage and separation efficiency.

data.question: Does ZNU-2 exhibit the highest C3H4/C3H6 separation potential among all materials mentioned?
